quote: The only journey is the journey within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Mental health is not a destination, but a process. It's about how you drive, not where you're going.
author: Noam Shpancer

quote: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Feelings are just visitors. Let them come and go.
author: Mooji

quote: Sometimes the people around you won’t understand your journey. They don’t need to, it’s not for them.
author: Joubert Botha

quote: Healing takes time, and asking for help is a courageous step.
author: Mariska Hargitay

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn't.
author: John Green

quote: Promise me you’ll always remember: You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Your present circumstances don’t determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: This too shall pass.
author: Persian Proverb

quote: Every day begins with an act of courage and hope: getting out of bed.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: It's okay to not be okay, as long as you are not giving up.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: What mental health needs is more sunlight, more candor, and more unashamed conversation.
author: Glenn Close

quote: You are not your illness. You have an individual story to tell. You have a name, a history, a personality. Staying yourself is part of the battle.
author: Julian Seifter

quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Sometimes the worst place you can be is in your own head.
author: Anonymous
